| The Abominable Snowman:* has [a head, a couple of arms, and a torso](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid").
* is an [animal](/wiki/Animal "Animal").
* is [carnivorous](/wiki/Carnivore "Carnivore").
* is not a valid [polymorphable](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph") form.
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision"). |                                                                        |

- *For the monster in [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), see [Abominable Snowman (EvilHack)](/wiki/Abominable_Snowman_\(EvilHack\) "Abominable Snowman (EvilHack)").*

The **Abominable Snowman**, Y, is a [unique](/wiki/Unique "Unique") [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") that appears in [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack"). It is a [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong") and [carnivorous](/wiki/Carnivorous "Carnivorous") [apelike creature](/wiki/Apelike_creature "Apelike creature").

The Abominable Snowman has two claw attacks, with the first dealing cold damage, as well as a bite attack and the ability to breathe frost, and possesses [cold resistance](/wiki/Cold_resistance "Cold resistance").

Eating The Abominable Snowman's [corpse](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse") or [tin](/wiki/Tin "Tin") conveys cold resistance for 14,000 turns.

## Generation

The Abominable Snowman is always generated hostile, and is not a valid form for normal [polymorph](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph").

The Abominable Snowman is encountered at the end of the [Ice Caves](/index.php?title=Ice_Caves\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Ice Caves (page does not exist)") [adventure branch](/index.php?title=Adventure_branch\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Adventure branch (page does not exist)").

The Abominable Snowman is [always generated with](/wiki/Monster_starting_inventory "Monster starting inventory") The Abominable Veil.

### The Abominable Veil

**The Abominable Veil** is an [artifact](/wiki/Artifact "Artifact") [cloak of displacement](/wiki/Cloak_of_displacement "Cloak of displacement") that confers cold resistance while worn.

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Abominable_Snowman_\(notdNetHack\)\&action=edit)*

[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")
html:
Abominable Snowman (notdNetHack)

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
Y Abominable Snowman (No tile)
Difficulty 15
Attacks claw 1d6 frost, claw 1d6 physical, bite 1d6 physical, breath 2d6 frost
Y Abominable Snowman (No tile)
Difficulty 15
Attacks

claw 1d6 frost, claw 1d6 physical, bite 1d6 physical, breath 2d6 frost

Base level 12
Base experience 345
Speed 15
Base AC 6
Base MR 0
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 2600
Nutritional value 700
Size huge
Resistances cold
Resistances conveyed cold

The Abominable Snowman:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is an animal.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • is strong.
  • can be seen through infravision.

For the monster in EvilHack, see Abominable Snowman (EvilHack).

The Abominable Snowman, Y, is a unique monster that appears in notdNetHack. It is a strong and carnivorous apelike creature.

The Abominable Snowman has two claw attacks, with the first dealing cold damage, as well as a bite attack and the ability to breathe frost, and possesses cold resistance.

Eating The Abominable Snowman's corpse or tin conveys cold resistance for 14,000 turns.

Generation

The Abominable Snowman is always generated hostile, and is not a valid form for normal polymorph.

The Abominable Snowman is encountered at the end of the Ice Caves adventure branch.

The Abominable Snowman is always generated with The Abominable Veil.

The Abominable Veil

The Abominable Veil is an artifact cloak of displacement that confers cold resistance while worn.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Abominable_Snowman_(notdNetHack)&oldid=159913"

The '''Abominable Snowman''', {{white|Y}}, is a [[unique]] [[monster]] that appears in [[notdNetHack]]. It is a [[strong]] and [[carnivorous]] [[apelike creature]].

The Abominable Snowman has two claw attacks, with the first dealing cold damage, as well as a bite attack and the ability to breathe frost, and possesses [[cold resistance]].

Eating The Abominable Snowman's [[corpse]] or [[tin]] conveys cold resistance for 14,000 turns.

==Generation==
The Abominable Snowman is always generated hostile, and is not a valid form for normal [[polymorph]].

The Abominable Snowman is encountered at the end of the [[Ice Caves]] [[adventure branch]].

The Abominable Snowman is [[Monster starting inventory|always generated with]] The Abominable Veil.

===The Abominable Veil===
'''The Abominable Veil''' is an [[artifact]] [[cloak of displacement]] that confers cold resistance while worn.
